title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 202.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 202.1 - Scope

State Regulations

The following relates to public employees of a local
government which has acted through its legislative body pursuant to section
206.1
of the act and established an
impartial agency to administer procedures not inconsistent with section 207 of
the act and pertinent sections of this Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
202.1

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
